pages.text: The Ultimatum has several side guns and a VLS with 8 missile cells. On top of that, the ship excels at disabling opponents, making it a top priority for enemies to take out. Failing to do so in time may yield devastating results.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Everlasting Missiles/$$(br)The ship fires one of its missiles, $(l)dealing 2 damage to whatever tile it hit/$. This ability has $(l)8 Uses/$ and costs $(l)12 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/turn_ender)$(l)Suppressing Crystals/$$(br)Spread across the ship are several green crystals. $(l)When hit/$, the crystal shatters and $(l)instantly ends the opponent's turn/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
